title: Chaos Theory
description: Cyber Metalstep and Deep Shamanic Ambient Cinematic Music Loop Pack is a premium collection available on the Unreal Engine Marketplace.
longDescription:
Chaos Theory is a high-quality AAA asset music Loop pack available on the Unreal Engine Marketplace.

It features a collection of Metalstep music with a cinematic style, seamlessly blending Brostep and Metal elements. Created by the Kloudization Band, known for producing the 'time rifters' game music on Oculus Rift, which received the Best VR Game Award in 2014. Additionally, the music has been used in projects such as Krampus Kills for Xbox XS game and more.


From perfect divination action to cyber-style and Viking ancient inspiration, the textures are not overly bright, allowing space in the sound spectrum for adding your own sound effects and voiceovers.


Credits:

Vocal and re-amp in the largest cinematic recording studio in Europe, Besco Studio in Paris.

  • Michael Buyens: Vocal Recorder
  • Kloudization band: Production
  • Robert Slump : Composer
  • Jaff: Mastering
